description: A traditional Finnish plucked string instrument played over the lap. It has a distinctive bell-like sound.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your kantele.
You play a haunting, forlorn tune with your kantele.
You play a kantele rendition of Säkkijärven Polkka.

description: A discreet adult toy perfect for winding down and relaxing. Not as powerful as a regular vibrator, but takes up less space.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' that was once fresh and just what any soldier needed. It comes with various food things and accessories. Nowadays, it's not looking as hot, but the contents should still be nice! Disassemble to unpack.
The now unsealed main course of a vintage MRE. It's not looking incredibly appetizing, but it should still be good eating.
Well, this thing's sure obscene. It appears to be quite hefty and anatomically correct, too. If that's your thing, go wild. Pervert.
Good lord! How depraved can someone get? You suppose you could use it to whack zombies around thanks to its sheer size, if you won't mind it flopping around. Or just use it. Whatever.
